page.title: 14A DAY WITH THE ILLSLEYS
page.content: At 7.15 I wake up and get out of bed. I have a wash and then go and get my breakfast.It is 8 O' clock so I make sure that I am ready for{school.}I go to{school}by bike or car.At 8.10 my Dad goes to work by car,at{Kays}in {Derby.}Here he is sales manager.At 9.00 we go into{school}and work until 10.45 and we have a break.My Mum will still be doing the housework.We have dinner in{school}at 12.00.My Dad now will be driving from{Derby}to{Buxton}where he is general manager.After{school}I bike home and let myself in because my Mum is out teaching French to a boy in Derby.When we are all home we have tea and end the day together. {By {Tim Illsley.}
